name: Aimee's Mashed Cauliflower 'Potatoes'
author: Aimee
summary: This is a great low-fat and low-carb substitute for mashed potatoes. You may never go back to mashed potatoes again. Everyone that's tried it has loved it.
ingredients: salt and ground black pepper to taste
¼ cup shredded reduced-fat Cheddar cheese
directions: Preheat oven to 375 degrees F (190 degrees C)
Place a steamer insert into a saucepan and fill with water to just below the bottom of the steamer
Add cauliflower, cover, and steam until tender, about 20 minutes
Transfer cauliflower to a large bowl
Add mashed potato flakes, milk, and margarine; mash with a potato masher or fork until cauliflower mixture is fluffy
Season with salt and black pepper
Pour mixture into a baking dish and sprinkle with Cheddar cheese
Bake in preheated oven until cheese is melted, about 10 minutes
